author: Trone Dowd, VICE News
title: New York Plans to Isolate Coronavirus Patients in ‘COVID-Only’ Hospitals
description: Governor Andrew Cuomo announced the plan as New York City's death toll spiked by 50% in just one day.
content:
New York has a new plan to flatten the coronavirus curve: opening COVID-19-only facilities.
 Governor Andrew Cuomo announced the plan in a press briefing on Saturday afternoon, along with new coronavirus outbreak numbers for the state. New York state now has… [+3399 chars]
